mode.title: Action mode
mode.description: Use 'renew' in production. 'repost' for your dummy listings. 'dry-run' clicks nothing.

listing_filter.title: Listing filter
listing_filter.description: Restrict which rows to touch. Leave empty for all.

status_in.title: Allowed status values
status_in.description: Only act on rows whose status matches one of these values.

title_includes.title: Title must include
title_includes.description: Limit to rows whose title contains any of these substrings (case-insensitive).

max_actions.title: Max actions per run
max_actions.description: Stop after this many renew/repost actions (0 for unlimited).

screenshots.title: Screenshots
screenshots.description: Save summary page only or each row before/after.

delays.title: Human-like delays (ms)
delays.description: Randomized sleep range to mimic human pacing between actions.

min.title: Minimum delay (ms)
min.description: Lower bound of randomized delay between actions (ms).

max.title: Maximum delay (ms)
max.description: Upper bound of randomized delay between actions (ms).

timeout_sec.title: Run timeout (seconds)
timeout_sec.description: Abort the run after this many seconds.

headless.title: Run headless
headless.description: Set false to see the browser for debugging.
